text: Wow, it's amazing to see how far we've come in preventing measles deaths! ğŸ™Œ Thanks to the efforts of countries, WHO, the Measles & Rubella Partnership, and other international partners, an estimated 57 million lives have been saved between 2000-2022. ğŸ’ªğŸ¼But let's not get complacent! ğŸ™…â€â™‚ï¸ Routine vaccination and mass immunization campaigns are still crucial in reducing global measles deaths. ğŸ’‰Did you know that in 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine? ğŸ¤¯ And about 83% of the world's children received one dose by their first birthday! ğŸ‰Let's keep up the good work and make sure every child has access to this life-saving vaccine! ğŸŒ
